price: (Yūsuf berkata), "Yang demikian itu agar dia ( Al-‘Azīz) mengetahui bahwa sesungguhnya aku tidak berkhianat kepadanya di belakangnya dan bahwasanya Allah tidak meridai tipu daya orang-orang yang berkhianat.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika liyaʿlama annī lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī kayda al-khāinīna
